attributes.additional_details:
Take the bus industry back into public ownership in order to protect what we have left and create a service the public can be proud of.

Since the unnecessary privatisation of the 1980's we've had bus services cut while fares have gone up. Bus workers pay is extremely poor and local authorities are cutting subsidies It's simply not going to get any better left the way it is. The National Bus Company worked. RENATIONALISE NOW BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE.
